title: Rent a Villa Vacation in Riviera Maya (Kats Hart)
text: By Kats Hart Jul 2, 2015 Are you dreaming of visiting the Riviera Maya, Mexico on vacation? Then the Karisma Resorts Villas will be your destination of choice! Enjoy some of Karisma Hotels & Resorts finest establishments, which include beachfront views, luxury amenities and service, as well as an amazing Gourmet Inclusive experience that the hotels are known for. Choose from 3 Karisma Villas: Villa Carola, Villa Esmeralda, and Villa Maroma to stay in. Choose villa rentals for your Riviera Maya stay today!Karisma Villas AmenitiesReserve your own beachfront villa on the Riviera Maya with Karisma Hotels! Choose any one of three villas available: Villa Carola, Esmeralda or Maroma. When you stay at any one of the villas, you will be able to stay in a 5-bedroom luxury villa. When you stay here you will also have access to a private chef, Majordomo (butler), private home theater, private pool with king sized beach day beds, Jacuzzi for 10 people, BBQ gas grill, spa, surround sound system, My Gym kids club, fitness center, a slew of non-motorized water sports such as: kayaks, snorkeling gear, boogie boards, hobby cat, and much more!Dining & Gourmet Inclusive In addition to world-class amenities, guests of Karisma's beachfront villas have full access to the neighboring Azul Beach Hotel, which boasts five Gourmet Inclusive a la carte restaurants and bars for their enjoyment. Guests of Karisma's beachfront villas also have a special pricing deal with Le Chique Restaurant, one of the most avant-garde restaurants in the Riviera Maya. Le Chique is led by Chef Jonat치n G칩mez Luna who creates cutting edge Mexican-inspired dishes that include new flavors, textures and shapes. The restaurant is also the winner of the Best Tasting Menu in Mexico and the AAA Five Diamond Award. The best part is that Karisma Villa guests only pay $110 instead of $150 when they choose to dine at Le Chique Restaurant. Your luxury culinary adventure awaits!Riviera Maya ActivitiesThere are so many activities on the Riviera Maya to participate in. For example, if you love to be in the ocean, there are options for visitors including swimming, diving, snorkeling, fishing, kayaking and paddle boarding. If you want to get your adrenaline pumping, there are also zip lining, rappelling, and ATV tours that visitors can go on. Additionally, there are ancient Mayan ruins in Tulum, Chichen Itza and Coba that will transport you to a different time and place. Plus, there are a series of ecological parks with tours available showcasing the natural wonders of the region, with cenotes, jungle areas, and animals such as Xcaret Eco-Archaeological Park and Xel-Ha.Explore Karisma Villas TodayExplore Mexico in style in one of Karisma Resorts three villas! Stay in a 5-bedroom luxury villa and enjoy the best of the Riviera Maya with your own private butler, chef, Gourmet Inclusive menu, and more. The white sand beaches, crystal waters and caves of the Riviera Maya will be the setting for an incredible Mexican vacation. If you stay at one of the Karisma villas, you are guaranteed a fun and unforgettable trip. About the Author
